summary.span: 實作 Web 組件個人化的管理 (Management) 和管理 (Administrative) 功能。

span.span: Implements management and administrative functionality for Web Parts personalization.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別提供數個靜態方法和屬性公開 （expose） 管理和 Web 組件個人化的系統管理功能。This class provides several static methods and properties that expose management and administrative functionality for Web Parts personalization. 這些方法會套用預設個人化提供者中設定Web 組件控制項的控制項。These methods apply to the default personalization provider configured in the control for a Web Parts control. 如果您需要管理數個資料存放區做為個人化提供者，您應該在個別的個人化提供者類別直接使用方法。If you need to administer several data stores that are acting as personalization providers, you should use the methods on the individual personalization provider classes directly. 請注意，設定個人化提供者收集控制項是可從靜態屬性。Note that the collection of configured personalization providers for a control is available from the static property. 請務必注意，如果您的 Web 應用程式無法在執行的預設信任層級無法個人化或更高版本 (您可以設定自訂的信任層級，在 Web.config 檔案中使用``項目)。It is important to be aware that personalization will fail if your Web application does not run at the default trust level of or higher (you can set custom trust levels in a Web.config file using the `` element). 並信任層級檢查這兩個類別初始化的時間。The and classes both check for a trust level of when they are initialized. 如果您設定您的應用程式執行的信任層級，以及您使用預設來管理您的應用程式的個人化資料提供者會第一次應用程式嘗試存取個人化資料失敗，因為 ASP.NET 背景工作處理序中執行信任並沒有必要呼叫中的各種類別的權限命名空間。If you configure your application to run at a trust level of , and you use the default provider to manage the personalization data for your application, the first time that the application tries to access personalization data, it will fail because an ASP.NET worker process running in trust does not have the permissions necessary to call into the various classes in the namespace. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用數種方法在類別。The following code example demonstrates how to use several methods in the class. 這個範例包含參考名為 Web 組件使用者控制項的.aspx 頁面`Persadmin.ascx`。This example consists of an .aspx page that references a Web Parts user control named `Persadmin.ascx`. 下列程式碼提供範例.aspx 檔案。The following code provides the .aspx file for the example. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_PersAdmin#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PersAdmin/CS/defaultcs.aspx#7)] 此程式碼提供`Persadmin.ascx`控制項。This code provides the `Persadmin.ascx` control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_PersAdmin#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PersAdmin/CS/PersAdmin.ascx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定提供者指定的應用程式名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the application specified by the provider.
The application name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式名稱會影響擷取和儲存的個人化提供者，和可讓多個應用程式共用資料，藉由設定相同的應用程式名稱，或分割資料，在相同的資料庫，藉由指定不同的資料應用程式名稱。The application name affects the data retrieved and saved by the personalization provider, and allows for multiple applications to either share data by setting an identical application name, or partition data within the same database by specifying different application names. Web.config 或 System.config 檔案的個人化提供者 區段中找到的應用程式名稱。The application name is found in the personalization provider section of the Web.config or System.config file. > [!CAUTION] > 因為所提供的所有要求都使用單一的預設設定檔提供者執行個體物件，您可以有多個要求同時執行，而且嘗試設定屬性值。Because a single default profile provider instance is used for all the requests served by an object, you can have multiple requests executing concurrently and attempting to set the property value. 屬性不是安全執行緒的多個寫入，以及變更屬性值可能會導致非預期的行為，應用程式的多個使用者。The property is not thread-safe for multiple writes, and changing the property value can result in unexpected behavior for multiple users of an application. 建議您避免程式碼，以讓使用者能夠設定屬性才。It is recommended that you avoid code to allow users to set the property unless required. 應用程式的範例設定屬性可能需要管理多個應用程式的設定檔資料的系統管理應用程式。An example of an application where setting the property might be required is an administrative application that manages profile data for multiple applications. 這類應用程式應該是單一使用者應用程式並不是 Web 應用程式。Such an application should be a single-user application and not a Web application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法傳回的集合執行個體，每一使用者個人化狀態資訊所在`pathToMatch`參數值符合頁面的路徑`usernameToMatch`符合具有與它相關的個人化資料的使用者名稱頁面上，而是使用者會視為非使用中。This method returns a collection of instances, per-user personalization state information where the `pathToMatch` parameter value matches the path of a page, `usernameToMatch` matches a user name that has personalization data associated with that page, and the users are considered inactive. 換句話說，傳回每個記錄的使用者屬性值小於或等於`userInactiveSinceDate`。In other words, for each returned record the user's property value is less than or equal to `userInactiveSinceDate`. 傳回的集合僅包含執行個體。The returned collection contains only instances. 此方法會查詢萬用字元的字元傳遞至基礎資料存放區。This method passes query wildcard characters to the underlying data store. 目前相依於每個提供者如何處理字元，例如星號 （\*）、 百分比符號 （%） 或底線 (_) 萬用字元的支援。Support for wildcard characters is currently dependent on how each provider handles characters such as an asterisk (\*), a percent symbol (%), or an underscore (_). 一般來說，針對 SQL 相容的資料存放區，您可以執行萬用字元搜尋部分的路徑包含萬用字元，不會出現在開頭、 結尾或搜尋字串中的文字中間屬性。Normally, for SQL-compliant data stores, you can perform a wildcard search on a partial path with the wildcard character appearing at the beginning, the end, or the middle of the search string text in the property. 例如，若要尋找開頭的所有路徑 」\~/vdir"，則屬性會設定為"\~/vdir%"。For example, to find all paths that start with "\~/vdir", the property would be set to "\~/vdir%". 同樣地，部分的使用者名稱的萬用字元搜尋可能會出現在任何時間點的文字字串中的萬用字元屬性。Likewise, a wildcard search on a partial user name could have the wildcard character appear at any point in the text string of the property. 例如，若要尋找所有的使用者名稱開頭的"John"，屬性看起來"John %"。For example, to find all user names that start with "John", the property would look like "John%". 使用預設的個人化提供者， -會依字母順序，傳回衍生的物件，並將其排序依據以遞增順序的路徑和使用者名稱的組合。Using the default personalization provider, the -derived objects are returned in alphabetical order, and sorted by a combination of path and user name in ascending order. 集合中物件的順序取決於提供者。The order of the objects in the collection is determined by the provider. 如果`userInactiveSinceDate`已，然後將傳回的值，這個方法相當於。If `userInactiveSinceDate` is , then the returned values from this method are equivalent to . 兩者`pathToMatch`並`usernameToMatch`可以是`null`。Both `pathToMatch` and `usernameToMatch` can be `null`. `usernameToMatch`參數可以包含逗號 （，），因為某些資料存放區，例如執行 Microsoft SQL Server，允許逗號作為萬用字元。The `usernameToMatch` parameter can include commas (,) because some data stores, such as those running Microsoft SQL Server, allow commas as wildcard characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法傳回的集合執行個體`pathToMatch`值符合具有共用個人化狀態資料頁的路徑。This method returns a collection of instances where the `pathToMatch` value matches the path of a page that has shared personalization state data. 集合只包含執行個體。The collection contains only instances. 這個方法會將參數萬用字元的字元傳遞至基礎的個人化提供者，所以資料存放區處理這些字元取決於提供者處理例如星號 （\*）、 百分比符號 （%） 或底線 (_) 字元的方式。This method passes parameter wildcard characters to the underlying personalization provider, so how the data store handles these characters depends on how the provider handles characters such as an asterisk (\*), a percent symbol (%), or an underscore (_). 一般來說，針對 SQL 相容的資料存放區，您可以執行萬用字元搜尋部分的路徑包含萬用字元，不會出現在開頭、 結尾或搜尋字串中的文字中間屬性。Normally, for SQL-compliant data stores, you can perform a wildcard search on a partial path with the wildcard character appearing at the beginning, the end, or the middle of the search string text in the property. 例如，若要尋找開頭的所有路徑 」\~/vdir"，則屬性會設定為"\~/vdir%"。For example, to find all paths that start with "\~/vdir", the property would be set to "\~/vdir%". 使用預設的個人化提供者， -會依字母順序，傳回衍生的物件，並將其排序依據以遞增順序的路徑和使用者名稱的組合。Using the default personalization provider, the -derived objects are returned in alphabetical order, and sorted by a combination of path and user name in ascending order. 集合中物件的順序取決於提供者。The ordering of the objects in the collection is determined by the provider. `pathToMatch`參數可以是`null`。The `pathToMatch` parameter can be `null`. 如果設定為`null`，執行查詢時，會忽略此參數。If set to `null`, the parameter is ignored when performing queries.

character appearing at the beginning, the end, or the middle of the search string text in the property. 例如，若要尋找開頭的所有路徑 」\~/vdir"，則屬性會設定為"\~/vdir%"。For example, to find all paths that start with "\~/vdir", the property would be set to "\~/vdir%". 使用預設的個人化提供者， -會依字母順序，傳回衍生的物件，並將其排序依據以遞增順序的路徑和使用者名稱的組合。Using the default personalization provider, the -derived objects are returned in alphabetical order, and sorted by a combination of path and user name in ascending order. 集合中物件的順序取決於提供者。The order of the objects in the collection is determined by the provider. `pathToMatch`參數可以是`null`。The `pathToMatch` parameter can be `null`. 如果設定為`null`，執行查詢時，會忽略此參數。If set to `null`, the parameter is ignored when performing queries. 傳回的資料會受到`pageIndex`並`pageSize`，其中`pageIndex`控制傳回哪些記錄和`pageSize`控制要傳回的記錄數目。The data returned is constrained by `pageIndex` and `pageSize`, where `pageIndex` controls which records to return and `pageSize` controls the number of records to return. 例如，如果`pageIndex`已設定為 0 和`pageSize`已設為 25，傳回的資料就是前 25 個項目。For example, if `pageIndex` was set to 0 and `pageSize` was set to 25, the data returned would be the first 25 entries. 如果`pageIndex`已設為 1 和`pageSize`已設為 25，傳回的資料會是項目到 50 個 26。If `pageIndex` was set to 1 and `pageSize` was set to 25, the data returned would be entries 26 to 50. `totalRecords`參數會傳回所提供的記錄總數。The `totalRecords` parameter returns the total number of records that are available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法傳回的集合執行個體`pathToMatch`參數值符合頁面的路徑和`usernameToMatch`符合該網頁相關聯的個人化資料的使用者名稱。This method returns a collection of instances where the `pathToMatch` parameter value matches the path of a page, and `usernameToMatch` matches a user name that has personalization data associated with that page. 集合只包含執行個體。The collection contains only instances. 這個方法會將參數萬用字元的字元傳遞至基礎的個人化提供者，所以資料存放區處理這些字元取決於提供者處理例如星號 （\*）、 百分比符號 （%） 或底線 (_) 字元的方式。This method passes parameter wildcard characters to the underlying personalization provider, so how the data store handles these characters depends on how the provider handles characters such as an asterisk (\*), a percent symbol (%), or an underscore (_). 一般來說，針對 SQL 相容的資料存放區，您可以執行萬用字元搜尋部分的路徑包含萬用字元，不會出現在開頭、 結尾或搜尋字串中的文字中間屬性。Normally, for SQL-compliant data stores, you can perform a wildcard search on a partial path with the wildcard character appearing at the beginning, the end, or the middle of the search string text in the property. 例如，若要尋找開頭的所有路徑 」\~/vdir"，則屬性會設定為"\~/vdir%"。For example, to find all paths that start with "\~/vdir", the property would be set to "\~/vdir%". 同樣地，部分的使用者名稱的萬用字元搜尋可能會出現在任何時間點的文字字串中的萬用字元屬性。Likewise, a wildcard search on a partial user name could have the wildcard character appear at any point in the text string of the property. 例如，若要尋找所有的使用者名稱開頭的"John"，屬性看起來"John %"。For example, to find all user names that start with "John", the property would look like "John%". 使用預設的個人化提供者， -會依字母順序，傳回衍生的物件，並將其排序依據以遞增順序的路徑和使用者名稱的組合。Using the default personalization provider, the -derived objects are returned in alphabetical order, and sorted by a combination of path and user name in ascending order. 集合中物件的順序取決於提供者。The ordering of the objects in the collection is determined by the provider. 兩者`pathToMatch`並`usernameToMatch`可以是`null`。Both `pathToMatch` and `usernameToMatch` can be `null`. `usernameToMatch`參數可以有逗號 （，），因為某些資料存放區，例如執行 Microsoft SQL Server，允許逗號作為萬用字元。The `usernameToMatch` parameter can have commas (,) because some data stores, such as those running Microsoft SQL Server, allow commas as wildcard characters. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 完整的範例，請參閱在類別概觀主題。The complete example can be found in the class overview topic. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回的集合僅包含執行個體。The returned collection contains only instances. 使用預設的個人化提供者， -會依字母順序，傳回衍生的物件，並將其排序依據以遞增順序的路徑和使用者名稱的組合。Using the default personalization provider, the -derived objects are returned in alphabetical order, and sorted by a combination of path and user name in ascending order. 集合中物件的順序取決於提供者。The order of the objects in the collection is determined by the provider. 這個方法會傳回項目位置的使用者屬性值小於或等於屬性值。This method returns items where the user's property value is less than or equal to the property value. 如果是，這個方法會有效地傳回每位使用者的所有資料在基礎資料存放區中。If is , this method effectively returns all per-user data in the underlying data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回的集合僅包含執行個體。The returned collection contains only instances. 使用預設的個人化提供者， -會依字母順序，傳回衍生的物件，並將其排序依據以遞增順序的路徑和使用者名稱的組合。Using the default personalization provider, the -derived objects are returned in alphabetical order, and sorted by a combination of path and user name in ascending order. 集合中物件的順序取決於提供者。The order of the objects in the collection is determined by the provider. 這個方法會傳回項目位置的使用者屬性值小於或等於屬性值。This method returns items where the user's property value is less than or equal to the property value. 如果是，這個方法會有效地傳回每位使用者的所有資料在基礎資料存放區中。If is , this method effectively returns all per-user data in the underlying data store. 傳回值會受限於`pageIndex`並`pageSize`參數，其中`pageIndex`控制傳回哪些記錄和`pageSize`控制要傳回的記錄數目。The return values are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters, where `pageIndex` controls which records to return and `pageSize` controls the number of records to return. 例如，如果`pageIndex`已設定為 0 和`pageSize`已設為 25，傳回的資料就是前 25 個項目。For example, if `pageIndex` was set to 0 and `pageSize` was set to 25, the data returned would be the first 25 entries. 如果`pageIndex`已設為 1 和`pageSize`已設為 25，傳回的資料會是項目到 50 個 26。If `pageIndex` was set to 1 and `pageSize` was set to 25, the data returned would be entries 26 to 50. `totalRecords`參數會傳回所提供的記錄總數。The `totalRecords` parameter returns the total number of records that are available.

span.span: The count of the per-user personalization items in the underlying data store for inactive users.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回記錄的頁面符合指定的位置`pathtoMatch`參數與使用者屬性值小於或等於屬性值。This method returns records where the page matches the specified `pathtoMatch` parameter and the user's property value is less than or equal to the property value. 如果設為，會傳回所有使用者的個人化資訊的計數。If is set to , a count of all users' personalization information is returned. 請注意，`pathToMatch`參數可以包含萬用字元。Note that the `pathToMatch` parameter can include wildcard characters. 方法會將萬用字元的字元傳遞至基礎資料存放區。The method passes wildcard characters to the underlying data store. 萬用字元的支援，目前相依於每個提供者處理例如星號 （\*）、 百分比符號 （%） 或底線 (_) 字元的方式。Wildcard character support is currently dependent on how each provider handles characters such as an asterisk (\*), a percent symbol (%), or an underscore (_). 一般來說，針對 SQL 相容的資料存放區，您可以執行萬用字元搜尋部分的路徑包含萬用字元，不會出現在開頭、 結尾或搜尋字串中的文字中間屬性。Normally, for SQL-compliant data stores, you can perform a wildcard search on a partial path with the wildcard character appearing at the beginning, the end, or the middle of the search string text in the property. 例如，若要尋找開頭的所有路徑 」\~/vdir"，則屬性會設定為"\~/vdir%"。For example, to find all paths that start with "\~/vdir", the property would be set to "\~/vdir%". `pathToMatch`參數可以是`null`。The `pathToMatch` parameter can be `null`. 如果設定為`null`，執行查詢時，會忽略此參數。If set to `null`, the parameter is ignored when performing queries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回每位使用者的數目計數個人化項目中所存在的基礎資料存放區指定`usernameToMatch`。This method returns a count of the number of per-user personalization items in the underlying data store that exist for the given `usernameToMatch`. 請注意，`usernameToMatch`參數可以包含萬用字元。Note that the `usernameToMatch` parameter can include wildcard characters. 這個方法會將萬用字元傳遞至基礎資料存放區。This method passes wildcard characters to the underlying data store. 萬用字元的支援，目前相依於每個提供者處理例如星號 （\*）、 百分比符號 （%） 或底線 (_) 字元的方式。Wildcard character support is currently dependent on how each provider handles characters such as an asterisk (\*), a percent symbol (%), or an underscore (_). 一般來說，對於 SQL 相容的資料存放區，部分的使用者名稱的萬用字元搜尋可以有出現在任何時間點的文字字串中的萬用字元屬性。Normally, for SQL-compliant data stores, a wildcard search on a partial user name can have the wildcard character appear at any point in the text string of the property. 例如，若要尋找所有的使用者名稱開頭的"John"，參數會看起來像"John %"。For example, to find all user names that start with "John", the parameter would look like "John%". `usernameToMatch`參數可以是`null`。The `usernameToMatch` parameter can be `null`. 如果設定為`null`，執行查詢時，會忽略此參數。If set to `null`, the parameter is ignored when performing queries. `usernameToMatch`參數可包含逗號 （，），因為某些資料存放區，例如執行 Microsoft SQL Server，允許逗號作為萬用字元。The `usernameToMatch` parameter is allowed to have commas (,) because some data stores, such as those running Microsoft SQL Server, allow commas as wildcard characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會重設基礎資料存放區中指定的路徑，與相關聯的所有個別使用者狀態，使用者的屬性值小於或等於屬性值。This method resets all per-user state in the underlying data store associated with the specified path, where the user's property value is less than or equal to the property value. 針對資料存放區需要一個以上的資料列的資料來儲存個人化狀態 頁面上，或使用者與頁面組合，重設資料列計數可能會有所不同的個人化狀態計數。For data stores that require more than one row of data to store personalization state for a page, or for a user and page combination, the count of reset rows might differ from the count of personalization state. 如果基礎提供者會公開交易感知的資料存放區的資料，這個方法會在單一交易中執行其作業。If the underlying provider exposes data from a transaction-aware data store, this method performs its operations in a single transaction. 它不是嘗試重設不存在的共用的狀態錯誤。It is not an error to attempt to reset nonexistent shared state. 如果是，這個方法實際上會重設基礎資料存放區，針對指定的路徑中的所有個別使用者資料。If is , this method effectively resets all per-user data in the underlying data store for the specified path.

Public Shared Function ResetState (data As PersonalizationStateInfoCollection) As Integer
public: static int ResetState(System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::PersonalizationStateInfoCollection ^ data);
static member ResetState : System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfoCollection -> int

param.name: data
param.span: 物件的集合，指出應該重設的資料。

span.span: A collection of objects indicating what data should be reset.

summary.span: 根據集合中包含的項目來重設基礎資料存放區中的個人化資料。

span.span: Resets personalization data in the underlying data store, based on the items contained in the collection.

returns.span: 已重設的資料列之數目。

span.span: The number of rows that were reset.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會根據在基礎資料存放區中的個人化資料重設集合中包含的物件。This method resets personalization data in the underlying data store, based on the objects contained in the collection. 您可以使用這個方法，選擇性地刪除混合的共用，以及每位使用者的資料會根據集合的內容。You can use this method to selectively delete a mixture of shared and per-user data based on the collection's contents. 物件表示，就會重設頁面的共用的資料;物件將會重設特定頁面，指出該位使用者的資料。 objects indicate that shared data for a page will be reset; objects indicate that per-user data for a specific page will be reset. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法不保證所有的重設發生在單一交易中因為指向隨機個人化資料集的集合。This method does not guarantee that all resets occur within a single transaction because the collection points to random sets of personalization data. 它不包含參考不存在的資料物件集合的錯誤。It is not an error for the collection to contain objects that reference nonexistent data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會重設基礎資料存放區中包含的使用者相關聯的所有個別使用者狀態`usernames`參數，並傳回已重設的資料列數目的計數。This method resets all per-user state in the underlying data store associated with the users contained in the `usernames` parameter, and returns a count of the number of rows that were reset. 它不是嘗試重設不存在的共用的狀態錯誤。It is not an error to attempt to reset nonexistent shared state.
